verses.verse: My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2254>corrupt<s%>, my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinct<s%>, the graves are ready for <S%H6913>me<s%>.
Are there not <S%H2049>mockers<s%> with <S%H5869>me<s%>? and does not my eye <S%H3885>continue<s%> in their <S%H4784>provocation<s%>?
Lay <S%H7760>down<s%> <S%H6148>now<s%>, put me in a sure with <S%H8628>you<s%>; who is he that will strike hands with <S%H3027>me<s%>?
For you have <S%H6845>hid<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7922>understanding<s%>: therefore shall you not exalt <S%H7311>them<s%>.
He that <S%H5046>speaks<s%> <S%H2506>flattery<s%> to his <S%H7453>friends<s%>, even the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>.
He has <S%H3322>made<s%> me also a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H6440>aforetime<s%> I was as a <S%H8611>tabret<s%>.
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> also is <S%H3543>dim<s%> by reason of <S%H3708>sorrow<s%>, and all my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>.
<S%H3477>Upright<s%> men shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H5355>this<s%>, and the innocent shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> himself against the <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H270>hold<s%> on his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and he that has <S%H2890>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H3254>be<s%> stronger and <S%H555>stronger<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> as for you <S%H7725>all<s%>, do you return, and come <S%H935>now<s%>: for I cannot <S%H4672>find<s%> one wise man among <S%H2450>you<s%>.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past<s%>, my <S%H2154>purposes<s%> are broken <S%H5423>off<s%>, even the <S%H4180>thoughts<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
They <S%H7760>change<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> into <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H7138>short<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
If I <S%H6960>wait<s%>, the <S%H7585>grave<s%> is my <S%H1004>house<s%>: I have <S%H7502>made<s%> my <S%H3326>bed<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
I have <S%H7121>said<s%> to <S%H7845>corruption<s%>, You are my <S%H1>father<s%>: to the <S%H7415>worm<s%>, You are my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and my <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And where is <S%H645>now<s%> my <S%H8615>hope<s%>? as for my <S%H8615>hope<s%>, who shall see <S%H7789>it<s%>?
They shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H905>bars<s%> of the <S%H7585>pit<s%>, when our <S%H5183>rest<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
